thread.title: Great hotel and service, Eric from Concierge was outstanding
thread.title_full: Great hotel and service, Eric from Concierge was outstanding - Review of Renaissance Beijing Wangfujing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Reneepayne
title: Great hotel and service, Eric from Concierge was outstanding
text: Not only was the hotel beautiful, but the staff was so friendly, especially Eric (and Tom) from the Concierge who helped make our stay comfortable and amazing! Huge thank you and praise goes to them. They gave us great guidance on how to get to the Great Wall and how to plan our stay to see everything we wanted to. They were so knowledgeable and polite and kind - they went out of their way to help us. Thank you both for making our stay so pleasant!
